channel.title: Change Colors In Client
channel.description: I have a client and such.. I need to know how to make stuff like Guthix Robe Top into black and a halloween mask into black. Whoever helps me will get Rep++ If i could. I will just worship you like a god. Oh and also.. I am a newb so what do I edit? Client.Java in the client files?

item.title: Change Colors In Client
item.dc:creator: @Pkayer-X Pkayer-X
item.description:
@Pkayer-X wrote:

Hm… I see…
I have one specifically for my server all the ids are right and that…
Also do you have msn so we will learn easier?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2008, 09:22:57 AM[/size][hr]Oh poo. My client is messed up now… -.- Time to find a new one to start over

Read full topic

item.title: Change Colors In Client
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

The models are client-side, so you’ll have to edit the client to reflect the changes… meaning you have to have a client specifically created for your server

Read full topic
